contextId.information: Zebul is quoting  Gaal's boast back to Gaal. This can be translated as a statement and as an indirect quote. AT: "you who said that we should not serve Abimelech." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_quotations]])
contextId.quote: you who said, 'Who is Abimelech that we should serve him?'
